alert.note: Alert for Chester; Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 2:20PM CDT until June 12 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern McNairy County in west Tennessee... West central Hardin County in west Tennessee... Central Chester County in west Tennessee... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 220 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Henderson, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Henderson, Selmer, Adamsville, Jacks Creek, Morris Chapel, McNairy, Crump, Bethel Springs, Eastview, Finger, Stantonville, Enville, Forty Forks, Hickory Flats, Mount Vinson, New Lawton, Martin Camp, Good Hope, Old Lawton and Gilchrist. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
